version_description:
Fixed bugs and optimized for iOS 9 and iPhone 6S.

Fix a bug with "Today" Trip PIDs.

Fix for GM.ENGINE.IAC.

Fuel level adjusts more quickly after a fillup or parking on a hill.

Newer Automatic devices now connect more easily.

- Fix for downloading dashboards on iOS 9

- Fix for App Radio on iOS 9

Better compatibility with Kiwi 3

Remove a message about disabled Bluetooth

Better compatibility with Kiwi 3

Remove a message about disabled Bluetooth

Added kml units for fuel economy

SAE.IAT PID priority has changed to update more often

Added some Ford/GM PIDs
Add cancel button to PID search bar

- Fix the dashboard trip page to correctly display KML units

- Fix fuel cost to work correctly with gallons

Added support for Carista BLE interface
Updated Tuxedo dashboard to support kml units on the performance page

Now supports Auto Meter DashLink hardware!
New and improved main menu layout with back button
Added support for OBDLink MX+ hardware
Full support for iPhone X screen sizes

Now supports Mazda enhanced data up through 2018!
Start / stop data logging button added to Dashboards screen

Updated maps integration with high resolution maps for GPS Track Mapping
Added share button to Performance, Race Track, and Skid Pad pages
Added custom GPS Track Mapping line coloration
Added audible alarm based on user set condition
Added aut

Updated with support for iOS SDK 13.5
Automatic logging and alarms will no longer be started unless there is an active connection to the vehicle (demo mode or log files could trigger these before)

Ford 2015 - 2019 enhanced packages now available
Performance screen now supports expanded sharing functionality
